title: Jesus Film Microservice Application Options Schema

name.description: The name of the application (`api-` will automatically be prepended to your application name).
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the node application (`api-` will automatically be prepended)?

directory.description: The directory of the new application.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add dependencies to package.json.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

tags.description: Add tags to the application (used for linting)

frontendProject.description: Frontend project that needs to access this application. This sets up proxy configuration.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint "parserOptions.project" option.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into <projectRoot>/project.json rather than including it inside workspace.json
